page.topic: How do I set the default value for a field?
page.description: A default value can be specified for a form field using Initialization commands.

description.p: If the form field is a top-level field, the default value is set using the [Initialization Commands] field in the Form's properties:
If the form field is in a data group, the default value is set in the dataGroupStart's [Initialization] property:
See [Initialization Commands] to learn more about how to define the default value for a field.
